items.title: Read A Book
items.description: Grab your favorite book and a blanket and simply unwind.

items.title: Binge Watch Netflix
items.description: It's only a binge if you watch more than six episodes at a time.

items.title: Take A Nap
items.description: A short 20-30 minute nap can make you feel refreshed and more alert.

items.title: Write Yourself a Love Note
items.description: Be your own biggest fan.

items.title: Light A Candle
items.description: But don't let burn for too long. Try a cozy scent like vanilla.

items.title: Color
items.description: Be intricate. Or not. Color inside the lines. Or not.

items.title: Watch A TED Talk
items.description: Be inspired by others.

items.title: Call A Friend
items.description: Texting doesn't count.

items.title: Play A Board Game
items.description: But not monopoly. That game destroys families.

items.title: Plan A Staycation
items.description: Be a tourist in your own town. Try a new restaruant or walk around a park.

items.title: Eat A Healthy Meal
items.description: Pizza doesn't count.

items.title: Unplug From Technology
items.description: Resist the urge to keep checking Facebook or email.

items.title: Have A Cup of Tea
items.description: Or Coffee. Whichever you like more.

items.title: Go On A Hike
items.description: A short mile hike still counts. Be sure to take water.

items.title: Write What You're Thankful For
items.description: Reflect on the good things in your life.

items.title: Buy A Bouquet Of Flowers
items.description: The fancy flowers. None of those cheap daisies.

items.title: Stretch
items.description: You're probably slouching.

items.title: Soak Up The Sun
items.description: Take a walk in the sunshine.

items.title: Take A Hot Shower
items.description: Use fancy body wash.

items.title: Go For A Joy Ride
items.description: Drive to simply drive. Get lost.
